name: Elei-Md
description: A Whatsapp md bot built in NodeJs to make experience better

PREFIX.description: Enter your desired prefix for bot.

PMPERMIT.description: Enter the value true if you want pmpermit enabled in pm.

NSFW_DETECTION_AI.description: Enter the value true if you want NSFW detection AI on in group and pm.

BOT_NUMBER.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be admin for the bot (should be in international format without + and multiple numbers must be separated by a comma ",")

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: Please put your OPENAI api key here.Get it from beta.openai.com

MONGODB_URI.description: A secret String for Mongodb Connection.(Required)

THEME.description: Put the theme name you want to use.Visit docs.secktor.live/themes/introduction

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Enter your HEROKU APP name same as above.

WORKTYPE.description: Worktype of your bot. Use public or private, It is only one percent likely that you will be banned if you use WORKTYPE as private. If public then everyone can use it.
